ratings.comment: I loved this professor. If you are interested in the topic you end up learning a lot of applicable situations through her life experiences. Hilarious Professor, made the class enjoyable. Highly recommended.

Joyce is extremely extremely energetic and gives a lot of examples from raising her own children that she calls "mom moments".  I thought the exams were somewhat difficult because of how specific they were.  Overall, take the class, but recognize that it is not a complete blow off class

I do not understand why everyone is so excited about Joyce. Yes, she is energetic and fun. But... Her lectures are basically about nothing, exams question/choice of answers are bizarre and confusing. Because of that class does exams poorly. However, she adds the points. After that grades come up.

Excellent teacher! Very approachable and lectures are very fun. Make sure you go to lecture and take good notes. Exams can be tricky but if you go to lecture you can definitely get an A. Also she offers extra credit. One of my favorite professors so far.
Exams tend to be more about applying concepts / theories so make sure you know them well. Interesting class definitely reccomend

This class was very fun! Joyce is so energetic and hilarious that the lecture is never boring. There are 3 exams, no final, and one paper. As long as you take good notes in lecture the exams will be easy! I definitely recommend this class!

Joyce is a really energetic and interesting professor. She gives great examples while teaching theories to help you remember everything. Exams are simple as long as you understand the examples she gives in class. I highly recommend.

Joyce is amazing. Power lectures can tend to get long and boring but she really makes the material interesting. Her tangents are fun and they (generally) relate to the material in some way. Attending lecture is important to get decent notes for the exams. She is challenging but if you put in the work you will do fine.
Joyce is amazing! She takes all test questions from lecture but you have to pay attention to get good notes. You can earn upto 10pts extra credit and so long as you study a little you'll be find.

Awesome lecturer! Very energetic and wakes you up in the morning. Her tangents are funny and relate to the material. Just putting in a little bit of effort and going to the lectures gives you a great grade!

Yes, she goes on tangents.  However, I think the tangents made the class a lot less stressful!  She is a very engaging lecturer, and the information presented is quite interesting.  Her tests can be tricky, but with enough studying (and incubation time) you should be fine.

I liked her and thought she was pretty engaging. She did go on tangents but I thought they were more funny than annoying. Her tests could be tricky because the situations were more abstract than in class but if you studied enough, you had a decent grasp of the material.
Funny professor. Her exams are challenging although only multiplechoice

I had heard only good things before taking her class. After two days, I dreaded ever going back. She  would go on the longest tangents imaginable. Barely any of her stories related to the content we should be learning. She used an overhead projector and hand written notes that had no organization whatsoever, was the most difficult thing to follow.

I loved going to lecture, it was really interesting material and she's very passionate about what she teaches.  She's flippant though and not very good at answering questions if you try to talk to her one on one.

Joyce is so energetic and engaging I always enjoyed coming to class, never missed one.  Lecture material is definitely on the test but if you don't read the book you will definitely miss some material that she doesn't really cover.  Her tests aren't very hard though if you know the material! loved her!
She is a passionate professor, but her exams are hard. You must study a lot to do well. I've never been to office hours, but she isn't very helpful if you ask questions after class.

Joyce is always fun and exciting, I actually look forward to coming to this class. Tests are somewhat difficult, but you can do well if you put in the time. Not hard at all to get a B, just put some time in and you will get an A, no problem. She also offers extra credit!

The only class I've ever actually looked forward to going to lectures! She relates side material which helps me grasp the concepts and keeps things really interesting. She gives out review guides a week before the test, if you know everything on the review guide in detail you'll get an A.

Joyce's lecture style irritated me more than any professor I've ever had. While she's energetic, she wasted ridiculous amounts of time in her class going off on tangents. Class is a very easy B, but a rather difficult A because of her unclear exams.

While she is energetic, her tangents drive me up the wall, and her exams confused me. I am nearly a straight A student and cannot seem to grasp what she is looking for on her exams. I studied a week ahead of time for one exam and got a C; perhaps it's just me not understanding psychology,or because I constantly get tuned out because of her tangents

One of the best professors I've had yet.  This class is very interesting.  Tests aren't hard if you study, and nearly impossible to get below a C if you don't study.  She's a great lecture and tells a lot of interesting stories. Loved her!

U should take this class. The two paper raise your grades up! and she gives u 25 points just for attending the discussion in class time. So even though i got C in my first and second exams, I sill get AB overall. Easy class and fun material

read book = easy A.  interesting stuff.  may trick you with the study guide though.  study all the stuff in the chapters, dont just use the study guide.  loved the class and she's fun, but i have to ay a little overrated.  very opinionated.
if you work at it you should be able to get an A

While her class was entertaining  do not let her fool you.  My grandfather died during the time I was taking her class and his funeral landed on the day before an exam.  She refused to let me make other arrangements, claiming "I hear this excuse all the time"  I know I am not the only one this has happened to with her.
Joyce is one of the best professors I've had - extremely energetic and interested in the material she teaches.  I would recommend taking any of her classes!
She is a very energetic teacher with a lot of good explainations of what she teaches.
This is not the easiest class, but very interesting. Joyce goes off on tangents and is very passionate, which adds to the fun. Fair, easy extra credit, most people do very well.
Joyce is simply wonderful! She manages to make the lectures entertaining and interesting even at 8:50 in the morning! I love this class and the grading seems fair.
Joyce is a very passionate and energetic teacher.  If you have to take any Ed Psych classes, take one with her if you have the chance.
She's VERY energetic.  This is probably one of the only classes I've never almost fallen asleep in.  You'll love her.
Joyce is an amazing professor, I have never been more engaged in a class and I would most definitely recommend her.

Joyce is a great professor, and it is a really interesting class. She does go off on tangents a lot, but they are interesting and helped me relate the info we learned in class. The tests are pretty easy... I recommend this class.
Such an easy class. But she does go off on tangents a lot so be prepared! Overall good!

By far one of the BEST professors I've had here!  I loved every single lecture - she is so much fun!  Her lectures were never boring - she always had some funny story to tell to relate to the material.  Class is very easy - and you learn a lot. And that's a hard combo to find here, so I'd highly recommend this class with her! I loved it!

Joyce is awesome. One of my favorite professors ever. Way better than the ed psych professor I have now. Class is interesting and straightforward. She knows her stuff and is excited to teach and get everyone involved. Plus, she gives you candy when you take exams. I love her classes!
I loved going to her lectures, they were very interesting and she is a great speaker. Great class, would highly reccomend.
No Comments
She is simply a wonderful professor
She is an amazing professor!  Very excited to teach and you'll love going to class.  My favorite professor thus far.  Anyone would be lucky to choose her as a professor!
fun class, good sense of humor and makes the subject really comprehensible, don't really have to read the book if you attend the lectures.
everything is very fair and interesting.  She keeps you entertained as you learn!
great
The most exited Prof you'll run across.  You will also get an amazing side plot on good parenting.

Great teacher! Entertaining and enlightening. She engages her students, even in a  very large lecture. Course is relatively straightforward and moderately easy. Anyone should be able to do well just by attending lectures, need to read and work hard for higher grades. Extra credit available.
Joyce was an awesome teacher, loved her sense of humor and how she brought personal experiences into the lectures.
She's an amazing professor. She keeps you entertained and you learn the material that is needed for the class/tests.
joyce is cool, yup, a little too jumpy and tangent oriented at times, and the class is basically by the book... meh
She's one of the best instructors I have had.
She's really entertaining, lectures are fun, tests aren't too bad, and everything is graded fairly.
